E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/9/1989
Subject: Progress of Erik Pappas
Dear Sir,
Erik Pappas has nothing more to prove at AA Orlando Twins!
He has an AVG of .296 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 6/12/1989
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Tim Teufel



Date: Sunday, 6/15/1989
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Steve Nicosia



Date: Wednesday, 6/18/1989
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Roger Mason



Date: Friday, 6/27/1989
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Andy Rincon



Date: Tuesday, 7/8/1989
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Jay Franklin



Date: Thursday, 7/10/1989
Subject: Progress of Casey Candaele
Dear Sir,
Casey Candaele is hitting the ball well at AA Orlando Twins!
He has an AVG of .281, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 8/20/1989
Subject: Gibson Alba healing process
Gibson Alba is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
